title: An Honest Broker: Remembering Brent Scowcroft – Association for Diplomatic Studies & Training

quotes: So I had an appointment on Thursday with Baker, and Friday with Scowcroft.
So I had an appointment on Thursday with Baker, and Friday with Scowcroft.
Friday I waltzed it over to the White House at about 10:30 in the morning.

organizations.name: Rotary Club
quotes: I was scheduled to make a speech to the Rotary Club [in Guatemala], which is the biggest gathering with businessmen in the country.

organizations.name: Public Affairs Officer
quotes: I got ahold of the Public Affairs Officer, John Tracy; a marvelous Irishman, a great friend of mine and an excellent PAO [Public Affairs Officer.]

organizations.name: National Security Council
quotes: Suddenly I remembered that General Brent Scowcroft, who was the head of the National Security Council, was a good friend of Dick Cheney’s.
